is an emerging growth company as defined in

emerging growth company, indicate by check

standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a)  
of the Exchange Act. ☐                        
                                              
Item 8.01. Other Events On September 21, 2021,
U.S. Bancorp announced that it had entered    
into a Share Purchase Agreement (the “Purchase
Agreement”) with Mitsubishi UFJ Financial     
Group, Inc. (“MUFG”) and MUFG Americas        
Holdings Corporation, providing for U.S.      
Bancorp’s acquisition of the core regional    
banking franchise of MUFG Union Bank, N.A.    
Closing of the transaction is subject to      
customary closing conditions, including       
regulatory approvals which are not within U.S.
Bancorp’s control. On September 16, 2022, U.S.
Bancorp announced that it and MUFG mutually   
agreed to exercise their right under the      
Purchase Agreement to extend the outside      
termination date of the Purchase Agreement    
from September 30, 2022 to December 31, 2022. 
A copy of the press release is attached hereto
as Exhibit 99.1 and is incorporated herein by 
reference. Item 9.01. Financial Statements and
Exhibits. (d) Exhibits.
